data.title: Columbia University Libraries
data.meta_description: Columbia University Libraries are the heart of the intellectual life at Columbia, and inspire inquiry, advance knowledge, catalyze discovery, and shape an inclusive and vibrant discourse all enabled by the work of the dedicated staff who are the heart of the Libraries.
data.text:
Collections in Drawings & Archives are arranged by creator, usually an architect or firm -- see the alphabetical list below. Click on the creator name to access finding aids or catalog records. Collections can also be searched in Columbia University Librariesâ€™ online catalog (CLIO):

Search by subject, architect, firm, or project

Set Format to Manuscripts/Archives

Set Location to Avery, Fine Arts, Ware

For collections not yet hyperlinked or for questions regarding our collections, please email us.
